channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Boulder community to come together for vigil after firebombing attack that injured 12
item.description: Members of the Boulder community are reeling from a firebombing attack that injured 12 people demonstrating for the release of Israeli hostages.

item.title: 2 more attacks on Jews heighten concerns about security in and around US synagogues
What we know about the visa obtained by Egyptian man who injured a dozen people in Colorado
